Dialog Quit.Title: Your game will be saved, are you sure you want to quit the game?

Game Tips.Cocoon tip1: SELECT THE HIGHLIGHTED CREATURE TO START A COCOON TILE MATCH. TO CLEAR IT, YOU MUST MAKE A MATCH OF THE COCOON'S COLOR NEXT TO IT!
Game Tips.Cocoon tip2: NOW SWAP WITH THE HIGHLIGHTED CREATURE NEXT TO IT TO COMPLETE THE COCOON TILE MATCH.

Game Over Lose Message.MessageRelaxedMode: PLAY AT YOUR OWN PACE IN RELAXED MODE
Game Over Lose Message.ScoreFinal: FINAL SCORE: <total score gained in this game>
Game Over Lose Message.TitleDontGiveUp: DON'T GIVE UP, GALAPAGO'S CREATURES ARE COUNTING ON YOU!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleDontWorry: DON'T WORRY, THE POWER OF GALAPAGO WILL BE WITH YOU!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleTryOneMoreTime: TRY THAT LEVEL ONE MORE TIME...
Game Over Lose Message.TitleDontDespair: DON'T DESPAIR, GALAPAGO'S CREATURES ARE ROOTING FOR YOU!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleAnotherTry: IT MAY TAKE ANOTHER TRY, BUT YOU CAN DO IT...
Game Over Lose Message.TitleDontLeave: DON'T LEAVE NOW, THINGS ARE JUST GETTING INTERESTING!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleNotForFaintOfHeart: GALAPAGO IS NOT FOR THE FAINT OF HEART...TRY AGAIN!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleYouCanDo: DON'T WORRY, YOU CAN DO IT!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleCreaturesAreYourSide: GALAPAGO'S CREATURES ARE ON YOUR SIDE, YOU CAN DO IT!
Game Over Lose Message.TitleShrunkenHeads: DON'T LEAVE NOW, THE SHRUNKEN HEADS ARE COUNTING ON YOU...

Game Over Win Message.Title: YOU WON!
Game Over Win Message.WonMessage: YOU’VE COLLECTED ALL OF GALAPAGO’S MAGICAL CREATURES AND FREED THEM FOREVER! NOW, THE ISLAND AND ITS GOLDEN TREASURES BELONG TO YOU; EXPLORE GALAPAGO WHENEVER YOU LIKE.THE CREATURES OF GALAPAGO ARE FOREVER GRATEFUL TO YOU, AND WILL BRING PEACE AND PROSPERITY FOR THE REST OF YOUR DAYS.
Game Over Win Message.FinalScore: FINAL SCORE: <total score gained in this game>

Level Won Message.Title: LEVEL WON!
Level Won Message.Level Won Continue: YOU WON! LET THE JOURNEY CONTINUE...
Level Won Message.Level Won Next Level: MORE CREATURES AWAIT IN THE NEXT LEVEL...
Level Won Message.Level Won 21 Magical Creature: GALAPAGO HAS 21 MAGICAL CREATURES -COLLECT THEM ALL!
Level Won Message.Level Won Well Done: WELL DONE, YOU ALREADY KNOW YOUR WAY AROUND GALAPAGO!
Level Won Message.Level Won MoreLevels Await: MORE LEVELS AWAIT, DON'T STOP NOW!
Level Won Message.Level Won Nicely Played: NICELY PLAYED, YOU ARE UNCOVERING GALAPAGO'S MYSTERIES.
Level Won Message.Level Won Fitting Nicely: YOU'RE FITTING IN VERY NICELY ON GALAPAGO!
Level Won Message.Level Won Keep Playing: KEEP PLAYING, THE ENTIRE ISLAND AWAITS YOU!
Level Won Message.Level Won More Beautiful Creature: MORE BEAUTIFUL CREATURES ARE IN YOUR NEAR FUTURE...
Level Won Message.Level Won Keep Going: KEEP GOING, YOU HAVE A KNACK FOR THIS GAME.
Level Won Message.Level Won Lucky To Have You: GALAPAGO'S CREATURES ARE LUCKY TO HAVE YOU!

Reset Warning Dialog.Title: WARNING!
Reset Warning Dialog.WarningText: RESETTING THE MAP WILL ERASE YOUR PROGRESS AND WILL START A NEW GAME!DO YOU WISH TO RESET THE MAP?
